Duration : 3 Years (6 Semesters)
 Total Intake : 120
 This is an integrated three year degree course divided into six semesters introduced and designed by Mumbai University keeping in view the following objectives:-

1. To create for the students of Mumbai University an additional avenue of self employment and also to benefit the industry by providing them with suitable trained persons in the field of To provide students with pragmatic knowledge in the field of Accounting and Finance.
2. To provide adequate basic understanding about Accounting and Finance education.
3. To provide students with pragmatic knowledge in the field of Accounting and Finance.
4. To prepare student to exploit opportunities ,being newly created in the Accounting and Finance profession.
5. To give an adequate exposure to operational environment in the field of Accounting and Finance.
6. To include training and practical approach by using modern technologies among the students in the field of Accounting and Finance.

1. The course shall be full time course. The duration of the course shall be six semesters spread over three years. 2. Intake capacity – 60 students.
 3. The course shall consist of 40 students.
 4. Semester I,II,III and IV shall consist of 7 papers each. Semester V and VI will have six papers each.
 5. Total number of lectures per paper per semester shall be maximum 55 of 50 minutes duration each.

1. A candidate for being eligible for admission to this course shall have passed HSC Exam or equivalent exam by securing not less than 35% marks at first attempt\n 2. Student passing an exam equivalent to HSC Board, Mumbai and Inter-Mediate (Arts / Commerce / science ) of Mumbai University or from other state and immigrating from other Universities , Boards and Seeking admission to the first year, will be admitted if he / she produce a valid “Provisional Eligibility Certificate” issued by Mumbai University for the current academic year and for the desired course. Such students should submit migration certificate, Statement of Marks and Passing Certificate along with true copies within two months from the date of admission. If student fails to do so, admission is liable to be cancelled.\n 3. Every candidate admitted to the degree course in the affiliated college shall have register with the Mumbai University.
